name: The Secrets (leonvoskuil)
description:
Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2022 Submission

by

Florian Ubink - Programmer

Leon Voskuil - Audio/Design/Writing

Laura Houwaart - Writing

What is the story in the statements? Discover the truth and you'll discover the story.

A Janky atmospheric game. The fail state is kinda bugged so the feedback loop isn't really working in the submission version V0.02
We made in roughly 8 to10 hours on the last day since we had work the day before.

There are 2 chapters vaguely included. More is written but to be added. Also there will be more feedback on the story and world itself

V0.2 Changelog

- Bugs and smoothed things out

- Grammar and revised some prompts
